title: List of Chancellors of Germany (1871-2025)
snippet: Helmut Kohl, serving from 1982 to 1998, oversaw the reunification of East and West Germany in 1990 and was instrumental in establishing the European Union. Angela Merkel, chancellor from 2005 to 2021, was Germany's first female leader and became ...

title: Chancellor of Germany - Wikipedia
snippet: Likewise Prince Karl August von Hardenberg acted as chancellor of the Kingdom of Prussia (1810–1822). At the conclusion of the Napoleonic Wars, the Congress of Vienna established the German Confederation as a replacement for the Holy Roman Empire, but this organisation did not have a government or legislature, only the Bundestag that represented the member states.

title: Who are some of the most influential German chancellors? - Lingoda
snippet: This list of influential German chancellors would not be complete without the country’s only Kanzlerin (female chancellor) up to now: Angela Merkel.
